pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 30$(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)1 on easy, 1 on normal, 1.5 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(l:world/structures#trial_chambers)Trial Chambers$()  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)When attacking something, a $(thing)Breeze$() moves via jumping large distances and attacks by firing $(item)Wind Charges$(), which deal high knockback. $(br)It can repel all projectiles, taking no damage from them.
